text: We have the right as individuals to give away as much of our own money as we please in charity but as members of Congress we have no right to appropriate a dollar of the public money.
author: Davy Crockett

text: I love to go to Washington - if only to be near my money.
author: Bob Hope

text: Maturity: Be able to stick with a job until it is finished. Be able to bear an injustice without having to get even. Be able to carry money without spending it. Do your duty without being supervised.
author: Ann Landers

text: Advertising is the art of convincing people to spend money they don't have for something they don't need.
author: Will Rogers
